title: Hide in Combat
description: You gain the ability to hide whilst in Combat. Attacking whilst hidden triggers the Backstab attack.

title: Mark Target
description: The Target gets the Marked Condition which confers a -2 penalty to Dodge for the rest of the encounter.

title: Rapid Shot
description: The character makes a ranged attack. If that attack is successful, they may make another, free attack.

title: Shield Rush
description: Perform an attack that pushes your opponent back one square if successfull. Deals normal damage.
